game.name: Goose Goose Duck
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Goose Goose Duck는 최대 16명이 플레이할 수 있는 소셜 디덕션 게임입니다. 플레이어들은 각기 다른 목표를 가진 그룹으로 나뉘며, 팀의 목표를 달성하면 승리할 수 있습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Goose Goose Duck is a game of social deduction for up to 16 players. Players are separated into different groups that are each assigned a different objective. Complete your team’s objective to win!

reviewHighlights.text: This game requires you to verify a separate email. The devs also require you to waive all injury claims against them in the event you are harmed, and...
I ended up joining the military because of this game. Will not elaborate further.
